body: There is hope for the man to progress as a character, as a human being, at the very end, disappointingly…. But… Seriously, humans need to think more often and consider the future and the many possibilities all the while maintaining a clear mind with a goal. Observations of others and of yourself and the world around you, it’s only then you realize that way too many people around you suck…. Which then it’s ultimately up to you to give them the benefit of the belief of good in oneself, or give them the utter mark of the “monster”.
